@@ -1,6 +1,13 @@
-mk=input('mat khau:')
-if len(mk)<8: print('Khong hop le')
-else:
-    if (x.isupper() for x in mk) and  (x.islower() for x in mk) and (x.isdigit() for x in mk):
+while True:
+    mk = input('Nhap mat khau: ')
\ No newline at end of file
+    if len(mk) < 8:
+        print('Khong hop le')
+    elif not any(x.isupper() for x in mk):
+        print('Khong hop le')
+    elif not any(x.islower() for x in mk):
+        print('Khong hop le')
+    elif not any(x.isdigit() for x in mk):
+        print('Khong hop le')
+    else:
         print('Hop le')
-    else: print('Khong hop le')
+        break
